issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fixVersions.description: Alloy items that will be included in CLI 7.1.0
fixVersions.name: CLI Release 7.1.0

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description 

All babel-* packages used in alloy recently had a new release, we should update to the latest version, ensuring all tests pass and testing sample alloy apps to ensure there are no regressions

comments.body:
Verified the fix in CLI core 7.1.0-master.22.
Did a quick check with the default alloy app, kitchensink v2 & with hyperloop examples app & it looks good.

Resolving & Closing.
